pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 7, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Calgary, Alberta

Private meetings.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit AAA Doors Ltd. in Calgary, Alberta, a local business that received federal support in response to the COVID‑19 pandemic.

AAA Doors Ltd.
6424 36 St NE

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Alberta, Jason Kenney.

Executive Suite, Mezzanine Level
Fairmont Palliser
133 9 Av SW

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi.

Executive Suite, Mezzanine Level
Fairmont Palliser
133 9 Ave SW

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Mayor of Calgary Naheed Nenshi will visit the CT - Oliver Bowen Maintenance Facility to make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

CT - Oliver Bowen Maintenance Facility
3910 54 Ave NE

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

Media appearance

8:30 a.m. A live interview with the Prime Minister will air on Calgary’s RED FM.
